title: need 8 more rp!
body: Hi rioters, i'm very excited for ivern release and i wanna get his skin too. Right now i have 1342 ;( rp and i need 8 more rp to get candy king ivern. To tell you the story i didn't count the rp when i bought my last skin haha.

replies.body:
Ivern is a super neat champion and I'm glad to see you're just as excited as I am for his release! :D

We may be able to work something out and help you with the RP difference if you reach out via a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). Let me know if you have any other questions. ^.^

You should contact Player Support, they usually help for little amounts of RP: 
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us
